permissions: Any user, including unauthenticated users, can list certification types.
validation_notes: Filters for can-apply-to and can-be-requirement-of must use allowed values. Allowed can-apply-to values: Trucker, User, Customer. Allowed can-be-requirement-of values: Job, CustomerTender, BrokerTender, JobProductionPlan, Project, Developer, Broker.

flags.name: --can-apply-to
flags.description: Filter by what it applies to.
flags.validation: Must be one of: Trucker, User, Customer.

flags.name: --can-be-requirement-of
flags.description: Filter by what it can be a requirement of.
flags.validation: Must be one of: Job, CustomerTender, BrokerTender, JobProductionPlan, Project, Developer, Broker.
